Title: Stability and Performance Optimization
User Story: As a user, I want the app to be stable and perform efficiently, so that I can use it without experiencing crashes or slowdowns, especially during peak usage and when handling large files.
Description: Users have reported frequent app crashes and slow performance, particularly during peak usage times and when working with large files. This affects user satisfaction and productivity, making it crucial to optimize the app's stability and performance.
Acceptance Criteria: - The app should not crash during peak usage times.
BDD Tests: - Given the app is under peak usage, when a user opens a large file, then the app should not crash.

Title: Enhanced Export Functionality
User Story: As a user, I want to export data in various formats like PDF, Excel, CSV, XML, and JSON, so that I can use the data in different applications and share it easily.
Description: Users need the flexibility to export data in multiple formats to facilitate data sharing and integration with other applications. This feature will enhance the app's usability and appeal to a broader audience.
Acceptance Criteria: - Users can export data in PDF, Excel, CSV, XML, and JSON formats.
BDD Tests: - Given a dataset, when a user selects the export option, then they should see options for PDF, Excel, CSV, XML, and JSON.

Title: Improved Search Functionality
User Story: As a user, I want faster, more relevant search results accessible on mobile devices, so that I can quickly find the information I need.
Description: Users have expressed the need for a more efficient search function that delivers relevant results quickly, especially on mobile devices. This enhancement will improve user satisfaction and productivity.
Acceptance Criteria: - Search results should appear within 2 seconds.
BDD Tests: - Given a search query, when a user searches, then results should appear within 2 seconds.

Title: Advanced Customization Options
User Story: As a user, I want to customize fields, roles, permissions, notifications, and dashboards, so that I can tailor the app to my specific needs and workflows.
Description: Users require advanced customization options to better align the app with their specific workflows and preferences. This feature will increase user engagement and satisfaction by providing a personalized experience.
Acceptance Criteria: - Users can create and modify custom fields.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they access settings, then they should be able to create custom fields.

Title: Enhanced Security Features
User Story: As a user, I want Two-Factor Authentication, SAML SSO, and multi-factor authentication, so that my account and data are secure.
Description: Users demand robust security features to protect their accounts and data. Implementing Two-Factor Authentication, SAML SSO, and multi-factor authentication will enhance the app's security and build user trust.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they enable Two-Factor Authentication, then they should receive a verification code on their device.

Title: Notification System Improvements
User Story: As a user, I want a reliable notification system, so that I receive timely and relevant alerts without being overwhelmed.
Description: Users face issues with excessive, delayed, or missing notifications. Improving the notification system will ensure users receive timely and relevant alerts, enhancing their experience and engagement with the app.
Acceptance Criteria: - Notifications should be timely and relevant.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when an event occurs, then they should receive a notification within 1 minute.

Title: Expanded Integration Capabilities
User Story: As a user, I want integration with Google Drive, Zapier, Trello, webhooks, and custom domains, so that I can streamline workflows and enhance productivity.
Description: Users request expanded integration capabilities to connect the app with popular tools and services, enabling streamlined workflows and enhanced productivity.
Acceptance Criteria: - Users can integrate the app with Google Drive, Zapier, Trello, and webhooks.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they access integration settings, then they should see options for Google Drive, Zapier, Trello, and webhooks.

Title: User Interface and Accessibility Enhancements
User Story: As a user, I want dark mode, larger fonts, mobile responsiveness, and screen reader compatibility, so that I can use the app comfortably and accessibly.
Description: Users need enhancements in the user interface and accessibility to improve comfort and usability, particularly for those with visual impairments or those using mobile devices.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they access display settings, then they should be able to enable dark mode.

Title: User Management Improvements
User Story: As a user, I want seamless password resets, email changes, and team invitations, so that I can manage my account and team efficiently.
Description: Users experience difficulties with managing their accounts and teams, such as password resets, email changes, and team invitations. Improvements in these areas will enhance user satisfaction and efficiency.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they request a password reset, then they should receive a reset link promptly.

Title: Advanced Reporting and Analytics
User Story: As a user, I want custom reports and usage statistics, so that I can analyze data and make informed decisions.
Description: Users require advanced reporting and analytics capabilities to generate custom reports and analyze usage statistics, enabling them to make data-driven decisions.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they access reporting tools, then they should be able to create custom reports.

Title: Improved Onboarding and Documentation
User Story: As a user, I want tutorials with videos or GIFs, so that I can learn how to use the app effectively.
Description: Users request enhanced onboarding and documentation with visual aids like videos or GIFs to facilitate learning and improve their experience with the app.
Acceptance Criteria: - Users can access tutorials with videos or GIFs.
BDD Tests: - Given a new user, when they start onboarding, then they should see tutorials with videos or GIFs.

Title: Enhanced Task and Project Management Features
User Story: As a user, I want recurring tasks, reminders, timeline views, and calendar views, so that I can manage my tasks and projects efficiently.
Description: Users desire enhanced task and project management features, including recurring tasks, reminders, timeline views, and calendar views, to improve their productivity and project oversight.
Acceptance Criteria: - Users can set up recurring tasks.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they create a task, then they should be able to set it as recurring.

Title: Reliability and Performance for Large Teams
User Story: As a user, I want the app to be reliable and perform well for large teams and projects, so that I can collaborate effectively without disruptions.
Description: Users express dissatisfaction with the app's reliability and performance when used by large teams or for large projects. Addressing these issues will enhance collaboration and productivity.
Acceptance Criteria: - The app should support large teams without performance degradation.
BDD Tests: - Given a large team, when they use the app, then performance should not degrade.

Title: Improved Data Management Capabilities
User Story: As a user, I want project duplication, data import, and approval workflows, so that I can manage data efficiently and streamline processes.
Description: Users request improved data management capabilities, including project duplication, data import, and approval workflows, to enhance efficiency and streamline their processes.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they select a project, then they should be able to duplicate it.

Title: User Satisfaction with Recent Updates
User Story: As a user, I want to express satisfaction with the new interface design, project templates, and notification center, so that I can enjoy an improved user experience.
Description: Users have expressed satisfaction with recent updates, including the new interface design, project templates, and notification center, which have enhanced their overall experience with the app.
Acceptance Criteria: - Users should find the new interface intuitive and appealing.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they use the new interface, then they should find it intuitive and appealing.

Title: Comprehensive User and Project Views
User Story: As a user, I want comprehensive lists of users, tasks, projects, and integrations, so that I can easily manage and oversee all aspects of my work.
Description: Users request comprehensive views of users, tasks, projects, and integrations to facilitate management and oversight, improving their ability to track and organize work efficiently.
Acceptance Criteria: - Users can view comprehensive lists of users, tasks, projects, and integrations.
BDD Tests: - Given a user, when they access user management, then they should see a comprehensive list of users.
